name: Koelsch Beer
description: 2 party cans Reissdorf Koelsch a 5,0l. Each party has a built-in tap (4,8% alcohol content). The set is ideal for getting a small party started. In accordance with the Youth Protection Act, we only sell this product to persons over the age of 18. By purchasing this product you confirm that you are 18 years of age or older.
